name: Satan is an Astronaut
storyline:
A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.

------

The Biology, Etymology, Ecology, and Limnology Zone - E-3U3 - or as it’s more popularly known, "The Bub,” is a marvel of innovation, and it stands as a testament to what one can achieve when the sky is no longer the limit.

Part forest, part proto-generation ship, the BUB is humanity’s latest and most significant attempt to bring Earthliness to the stars.

Hundreds of volunteers have joined the Faust Corporation in reaching skyward with new technology that pushes the boundary of what is possible with every mile it travels away from Earth’s loving embrace.

Of course, what would any ship be wi [I don’t think you understand. It’s not about money. It’s about what we hope to achieve here. These people don’t deserve this, and I’m not sure how long it can go on.] fully furnished, and with all the accommodations of home, the BUB is humanity’s best chance at a long-form journey into our galaxy.
summary: A woman who suffers from severe delusions wakes in the center of a forest aboard “The BUB,” a proto-generation ship from the mysterious Faust Corporation. Waking to a vision of a spirit she grew up with, she quickly learns that not everything is as it seems, and this waking cycle is anything but ordinary.
